question: Show journalists and editors who speak English and Spanish.
sql_query1:
SELECT Journalists.name
FROM Journalists
WHERE Journalists.languages = "English and Spanish"
UNION
SELECT Editors.name
FROM Editors
WHERE Editors.languages = "English and Spanish"
sql_query2:
SELECT Journalists.name
FROM Journalists
UNION
SELECT Editors.name
FROM Editors
WHERE Editors.languages = "English and Spanish"
interpretation1: What journalists speak English and Spanish and what editors also speak those languages?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all journalists and also provide a list of editors that speak English and Spanish.
